title: RASE-based Mobile Microlearning Design for Student-Centered Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and experience in operating language curricula
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service teachers to learn student-centered learning module design in microlearning environments accessible via smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can design language-specific learning modules using the four elements of the RASE model (Resources-Activities-Support-Evaluation).
Learners develop three or more student-centered activities that strengthen information technology skills.
Learners apply conceptual model-based digital resources (e.g., concept maps, interactive simulations) to language learning.

resources: Open Educational Resources (OER) Repository Access Permissions
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
